meanings.definition: Breathe quickly and loudly through the mouth, typically from exertion or excitement.
meanings.sent1: After running, he would pant heavily.
meanings.sent2: The dog began to pant after chasing the ball.
meanings.sent3: The exhausted squirrel would pant after climbing the tree.
meanings.sent4: The old engine seemed to pant as it struggled up the hill.
meanings.sent5: She could hear him panting from the other side of the field.

meanings.definition: A piece of clothing covering the lower part of the body, typically with separate coverings for each leg.
meanings.sent1: She wore a comfortable pant to the gym.
meanings.sent2: The store had a sale on pants.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally put on his sister's pant and it was too small.
meanings.sent4: The pant he wore was bright red, making him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The new pant she bought had a stylish design on the side.
